HINT.Title: Welcome to Table Safety!
HINT.Paragraph1: This module provides a simple way for players to request pauses, fast-forwards, hard-stops, and speaking opportunities during your game sessions.
HINT.Paragraph2: As a player, you can use the buttons added to your chat interface to send requests to the GM(s). GMs will receive notifications of these requests and can acknowledge them when ready.
HINT.Paragraph3: As a GM, you will see an acknowledgment button that lights up when there are pending requests from players. Click it to address the requests.
HINT.Footer: Enjoy a safer and more comfortable gaming experience!
